message.content: {"id": "42225", "title": "Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", "description": "I am unable to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination. The keybinding manager seems to recognize it as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word instead. When I try to reassign the key via the key preference page, it displays Ctrl+Del when I press Ctrl+Backspace. I am using a Swiss German keyboard with Swiss German locale.", "OB": "The keybinding manager is misinterpreting the Ctrl+Backspace key combination as Ctrl+Del and deleting the next word instead of allowing me to assign a command to it.", "EB": "I expect to be able to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination without it being confused with Ctrl+Del.", "SR": "Fix the keybinding manager to correctly recognize and allow commands to be assigned to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '42225', 'title': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", 'description': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace ", 'OB': 'Somehow the keybinding manager thinks this is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.If I try to reassing the key via key pref page it displays Ctrl+Del when I pressCtrl+Backspace.I have a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
